alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BALDWIN AND SOUTH CENTRAL ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Perdido Beach, or 7 miles northeast of Orange Beach, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Foley, Orange Beach, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Perdido Beach, and Elberta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
